Title: Relates to authorizing the Family and Children's Association to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status
Summary: Authorizes the Family and Children's Association to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status with respect to the 2019-2020 assessment roll for a portion of the 2019-2020 school taxes and a portion of the 2020 general taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the Family and Children's Association to receive retroactive real property tax exempt status
